test_cases.query: What are embeddings in machine learning?
documents: Embeddings are vector representations of data that capture semantic meaning in a continuous space.
Word embeddings map words to vectors where similar words have similar vectors.
Sentence embeddings represent entire sentences or paragraphs as fixed-length vectors.
Image classification is a task of assigning labels to images based on their content.
